rules_text:
First mate – Your starting deck contains “The [i]Abyssal Pilgrim[/i]” and no nonlegendary, nonland cards with mana value 2 or less. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
When Runix enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{B}{G}, Exile two cards that don't share a type from your graveyard: Return Runix from your graveyard to the battlefield. They can't block this turn.
